dc.title: Executive Secretary of the Department of Defense
dc.description: Official web site of the Office of the Executive Secretary. The Executive Secretary is part of the Immediate Office of the Secretary of Defense and is the head of an organization known as the Executive Secretariat. The Executive Secretary provides direct administrative support to the Secretary and Deputy Secretary of Defense.
